page.title: 02Thornes Park, Wakefield
page.content: Thornes Park is the main park for the City of Wakefield. It is used by all types of people to walk dogs, feed ducks, admire flowers and use the sports facilities. There are 6 tennis courts, a putting green, a pitch and putt course, football and rugby pitches, cricket squares, bowling greens, running tracks and adventure playground. Probably the biggest attraction is the pond. It is quite big and full of life. There is an island in the centre of the pond where ducks lay their eggs. Near the pond is a bird aviary. A fair comes to the park every 6 months and various city events are held there. These have included Sport For All events and an Ideal Homes exhibition. Most people seem to like the park for its open spaces and facilities.
